thread.title: United Servicers Associations Annual Service Training Institute(ASTI)2016 to Spotlight Smart Home Technology
thread.title_full: United Servicers Associations Annual Service Training Institute(ASTI)2016 to Spotlight Smart Home Technology | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: United Servicers Associations Annual Service Training Institute(ASTI)2016 to Spotlight Smart Home Technology
text:
(MENAFN Press) Throughout their national yearly educational convention the firm will be featuring the advances in home products technology as it links to the appliance service industry moving forward
Chicago IL-- United Servicers Association a national non-profit trade group managed to provide support and education to with marketing and management presentations has proclaimed the bonus of smart home technology to the lineup for the 2016 Annual Service Training Institute. The training event will transpire in Miami Florida from February 15th through the 18th.
The will offer extensive information on the different smart home products that have been produced in recent years and months. The plan is to provide a scenario where participants have the ability to engage with industry specialists to find out how the smart home and all of the associated technological advances will improve the way technicians do their jobs.  Learn more at 
"As a group that continues being diligent for its members we keep our collective fingers on the pulse of the profession so that we can get behind the trends and learn the that should be learned and get ahead of the curve to visualize how work-flows will reform going forward" said the representative.
The Annual Service Training Institute 2016 (ASTI) will be held at the Deauville Beach Resort in Miami FL February 15 - 18 2016. Go to to read more.
About United Servicers Association:
The aim and principle is to create and offer services and programs intended to help participants form substantial businesses in North America's competitive environment thru a variety of approaches such as enlightening courses and Peer Group Formation and Facilitation. Advantages to membership include chat forum online service library and insurance services and so much more.
